About where the story took place, all over the world.  Though, the Fertile 
Crescent (where it is thought that man began), is not in Africa.  It is in 
the Middle East.  I may be mistaken about that.  In the cartoons, nothing was 
told to pinpoint the exact location of the Transformers (though Megatron did 
attack New York and nearly attacked Seattle).  BUT, in the comics the 
Autobots and Decepticons crashed in Mt. St. Hillary, a volcano in Oregon.  
But you may think that's impossible, but it's not.  Humans existed far beyond 
40K years (by 40K BC there were an estimated 10,000 Humans on the planet).
